attributes.action: Remove the word Value from the description Value Added Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it strange that the use of the word Value is included in what is just an extra tax. Removing the word shows the tax to be precisely what is is - an Added Tax.

There is no value to it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
